summary: Internal DOJ email chain regarding the routing of a document with identifier WF 4319870. The correspondence involves officials from the Office of the Deputy Attorney General and the Executive Secretariat discussing assignment of the document, likely to the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Arlan Ettinger
persons.context: Name appears in the filename of an attached PDF document referenced in the email chain.

events.title: Initial routing request for WF 4319870
events.description: A Correspondence Management Analyst requests assignment guidance for document WF 4319870 to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).

events.title: Document routing to SDNY
events.description: Internal DOJ emails coordinate the assignment of document WF 4319870 to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) for handling.

keyFacts: The document is an internal DOJ email chain dated September 5-6, 2019, concerning the routing of a document identified as WF 4319870.
The correspondence indicates the document was to be assigned to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) for handling.
An attached PDF file is named 'Arlan Ettinger.pdf', suggesting Arlan Ettinger is a subject of or related to the document being routed.
